name: Evo Transportation & Energy Services, Inc.
description: Evo Transportation & Energy Services, Inc. is a leading provider of sustainable logistics and transportation solutions. Founded in 2017, the company focuses on revolutionizing the transportation sector by integrating advanced technologies and eco-friendly practices. Evo specializes in offering electric vehicle (EV) transportation services, leveraging a fleet of cutting-edge electric trucks and vans. The company aims to reduce carbon emissions and promote cleaner air through its innovative logistics services that cater to various industries, including retail, e-commerce, and food distribution. Evo's commitment to sustainability is evident in its investment in renewable energy sources and energy-efficient transportation technologies. With a forward-thinking approach, Evo is not only addressing current transportation challenges but also setting the stage for a greener future. The company's mission is to drive the transition to sustainable transport solutions while maintaining operational excellence and customer satisfaction. Evo is poised to be a key player in the evolution of the logistics industry, focusing on environmentally responsible practices that meet the demands of a rapidly changing marketplace.
